headline: Basin rig count down three as prices slide
summary: The rig count in the Permian Basin was down three this week, the latest count Friday by Baker Hughes shows, with 246 rigs active in the region. A year ago, 304 rigs were active in the region. Nationally, the oil and gas rig count is down six from last week at 542 rigs. A year ago, 589 rigs were active. The count shows that 406 rigs sought oil, down eight from the previous week, and 127 ...
